name: Rhodeah2010
text: Great selection of landscape rocks and the service was excellent — very pleased with how our project turned out!

name: Martin Bachtel
text: Woerner is great.  They have an excellent tightly-knit staff that works well together.   It is my number one go-to place for sod.  They have the best combined prices on pallets and delivery in the metro.  I can’t say enough good things about the Tif Tuf Bermuda that they offer.  They also have a huge array of shrubs and trees.

name: Andrew McCurry
text: Always willing to help load you up and get you out the door fast. That is important when you are trying to run a production based business.  Knowledgeable friendly staff. Great selection of plants and stone.

name: Er Tu2
text: I have always received prompt and courteous service from the knowledgeable staff. Highly recommended.

name: Joaquin Maldonado
text: Good place

name: Taylor Hardscapes
text: The management and staff at Woerner Landscaping are incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. Fantastic customer service you won't get anywhere else. Great selection and pricing.

name: Eric Beavers
text: Wide selection, knowledgeable & helpful staff. Convenient to Jefferson Shelby area. Delivery for larger  orders.

name: Jason Ciccarelli
text: Great people

name: Ben Thomas
text: Great customer service and tons of knowledge.  The entire team there is top-notch. If you're looking for plants or hardscape material,  Woerner is the place to go.

name: Blake Jones
text: Great customer service! Friendly staff. Always there to help with any questions or concerns. Large selection of plants, stone, and sod

name: Bernard Doug Cook
text: I live adjacent to them, my apt community's (my) back yard backs up to their work area & M-F oftimes til 10:30 p.m., it's waahh, waahh, waahh, w/their forklifts going night& day!

name: Dwaine Segers
text: Good $ @ great peoply very helpful

name: Rodney Griffin
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff

name: Jordan Boston
text: Great products

resp.text: Thanks Jordan for your review! We appreciate your business and thank you for shopping local!

name: Savanah Hatcher
text: I have always enjoyed going to Williams Orchard as a child and getting their ice cream while looking at all the variety of plants they keep. Today was definitely no exception as I took my young cousin for her first visit and her whole face lit up. She loved the .99 soft serve ice cream cone they currently offer as well as the green house. We will definitely be coming back for the Purple Heart they have in Green House 1. The staff was also very friendly and made sure that we were taken care of and aware of what we were looking at at all times.

name: John Mitchell
text: Crispitos!  Rectangular pizza!  Homemade deserts!  Really, come and check this place out.

name: N H
text: I normally love this place and have a good experience there.  This review is about the quality of items I purchased there on Saturday 9/28.  I bought bananas there and honestly they were horrible - they turned mushy within 2 days.  I get better bananas at Publix.  I also bought a 3 pack of chocolate chip cookies and I normally love their cookies but these were dry, crumbly and had no taste whatsoever.  It's like they were very old.  I hope they haven't changed their recipe because I've always thought they had the best cookies, but these were horrible!!

name: Donessa Strickland
text: Went here today with the kiddos. We really enjoyed it! Lots of fresh produce and homemade goodies! (Apple bread, peach bread, pecan pie, cookies, frozen biscuits, peas, butter beans, breaded okra, tomatoes, potatoes, blackberries, peaches, & tons of jams, jellies, honey, & of course apples). The kids wanted ice cream, of course, so we all gothe ice cream & played checkers. I even brought home a lovely new plant. Prices are good on most items, definitely recommend stopping by!

name: Jennifer
text: I love this place. We visit it quite often. They have great prices and a wide variety of thing's. It is very well worth going there you will find what you need much cheaper than any grocery store.

name: C Taylor
text: I went a few weeks ago to pick up Amish jellies. Staff is friendly and courteous. Store is well maintained and organised. Staff is also knowledgeable in regards to jams and jellies. I was trying to make jellies for the first time and got some good advice from the clerk. Pick up a few vegetables while I was there as well. Excellent selection with good prices. Can't beat small town orchards. You get the best of everything. I will be back.

name: Matt Browning
text: This is a great place to pick up fresh local produce. Oh and the home made apple pies and pumpkin bread is very delicious.

name: Valerie Proctor Davis
text: We love their cookies and pecan pies, and the fresh corn.  And the plants are beautiful - large and healthy.

name: #localguide Candy
text: Everything is Beautiful there homemade goodies are the best👏👏

name: Deborah Gargon
text: It's not the same as before. .the prices are higher. .the honey is $18.99 ..too much  !!!

name: Alarider USA
text: This is a large wholesale nursery with a retail outlet. Well worth the ride. If it is not up front in the retail area ask for it and they can bring it up. They are the source for the name brand retailers where you pay much more. Excellent selection on site.

name: William Rowe
text: Poor quality and so so selection. Most plants yellowish.

name: joah Holman
text: Exceptional choices.  Exceptional people.  75 years of business! Great plants great prices! Do yourself a favor check them out!

name: Tom Hahn
text: We purchased a large yellow marigold from SA about a month ago at Gulf Shores' Walmart. It is sitting on our deck looking at the Gulf of Mexico and is even prettier than it was when we purchased it. It is flourishing.  Wish I could post a photo. Thank you SA!

name: Angela
text: Best plant nursery in Mobile County! I am mever disappointed when I visit. It is definitely my happy place. They have a wonderful selection of flowers, herbs, veggies, shrubs, roses and trees galore. Its like walking into paradise. The employees are super friendly and always greet you with a smile and a willingness to help in any way they can. I highly recommend purchasing their 50lb bag of soil for all your gardening needs. It is absolutely amazing. I use it myself and my plants are thriving. I wish I could give them more than 5 stars as they definitely deserve it.

name: D Blanc
text: I think this is the largest nursery in Mobile and Baldwin Counties with endless rows of plants. It is located down the road from Bellingrath Gardens. They do gorgeous potted displays as well and sell rich soil by 50 lb. bags. It's a beautiful place imo; I like to walk through with a cup of coffee when I need to feel inspired. I met Oliver today, and he was a pleasure to talk to. He is knowledgeable about the industry and also recommended landscaping, sod, and outdoor decor companies in the area that were worth paying a visit to.

name: Brenda K.
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE!  There’s so many plants to choose from and the people are very knowledgeable and friendly.

name: Kenny Tran
text: I called around town looking for a nursery to buy some persimmon trees. I’ve spoke with Laura yesterday notifying her I would come check out the plants today. As soon as I arrived I was greeted by their staff and had a Miki tour of their nursery. I’ve lived in the area all my life and I will only be coming here from now on. Thank you Laura for your help!

name: James Fleming
text: Nothing else compares to the selection of beautiful flowers, trees and plants at Shore Acres Plant Farm! Highly recommend ☆☆☆☆☆!

name: Rhonda Heubach
text: Love this place and the people!!

name: Mary Ismail
text: I got my plants through PlantsByMail.com which is part of Flowerwood Nursery. I had been a regular customer over the past few years. When I pointed out to them that they charged me for a 3-gallon plant and all I got was a 2-gallon plant, they refused to re-price the plants for me. I sent photos and said these were the same size as the many 2-gallon plants I had ordered in the past. They claimed it was 3-gallon. I asked them to send me a size standard for a 2-gallon versus 3-gallon plant, i.e. height and width of plant. They wouldn't do it. They simply want to over-charge and give no the benefit to a loyal customer. I won't do business there again

name: Angel G
text: Drivers stay away from this place. 5+ hours to get unloaded and then you have to clean their mess. Be careful if you have a reload, make sure you can load all day or get a late appointment. Will not deliver here again.

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: Nice and friendly people. Come on by and visit. Beautiful trees, flowers, and other plants!

name: Judy Stanford
text: Horrible place to deliver. We have been here 5 hrs and still not done

name: Luis Rivera
text: This place is awesome

name: Luis Guizar
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good my workplace

(Original)
Muy bien mi lugar de trabajo

name: Jim Coleman
text: Five Stars for this place. We needed a hedge. Nancy showed us just what we should buy. The hardest working guy I've ever seen, Augie (with his wife and brother in law) came out on a Saturday and planted. Beautiful, healthy plants. Expert service and a great performance by everyone. The hedge looks great!!

name: Chuck Snead
text: Always good service and prices.

name: Leah Wolf
text: Wonderful garden center... knowledgeable staff and incredible selection!

name: Laura Mitchell
text: Beautiful healthy trees, shrubs, plants of all kinds.  Great service!

name: Will Shiver
text: So I just called Magnolia Landscape Nursery. The person answering the call greeted me with hello... I wasn't sure that I had actually called the correct number so I asked is this Magnolia nursery he said yes. I said if you have a minute I'd like to ask some information about pricing... He told me he did not have time. Not even sure I know what to say.I guess if you have enough business you don't even have to be polite.

name: andrew vigueira
text: Good size nursery with a great selection of landscape plants,soil, fertilizer,pest control and knowledgeable staff.

name: Jim Thompson
text: Helpful, courteous people  . Great selection and prices are equal to those at the big box places.

name: T.D. Taylor
text: They have an impressive selection and equally impressive staff, Nancy Johnson was incredible, she knew the ins and out of each plant. Nancy assisted with plant choices, heights and size and what each required she was very friendly, patient and helpful.. they have a huge variety of plants for home or gardens. This is one of those places you have to visit more then once. A good way to get started with our garden. The plants are also very inexpensive especially since they are not a big box retailer.

name: Linda Nolen
text: Had just what I went for!  Satsuma trees and a Washington Navel Orange tree!

name: Miranda McGregor
text: Love this nursery!  Staff is very friendly and very knowledgable about their stock, when they will have specific types of plants and best times to plant in our area. Purchased 2 crepe myrtles here and will be back. Very reasonable prices as well. Highly recommend stopping in if you're looking for good quality plants.

name: John Westendorf
text: Good selection of trees

name: Dan S
text: Great and extremely knowledgeable people!

name: Sandra Wessler
text: I guess customer service is not one of the services that Magnolia provides. I visited there yesterday and no one person came up to me and asked if they could help me. I wandered around the lot and nobody bothered to ask if I needed help. I was prepared to spend a great deal of money, but now, I will never go there again. I was bitterly disappointed and can't, in good faith, suggest this business to anyone.

name: Judson E Crump
text:
Best Selection of plants in Baldwin County.  This place is huge.  They have just about every landscape plant that people use around here, plus a decent selection of specialty plants and fruit trees.  The plants are all in good shape and the people here are knowledgeable about what grows well and what doesn't.

Unlike Lowe's, Walmart, etc., this is a local place that doesn't supply mass produced junk that won't grow well here.  Definitely recommend this place.

name: Robert Brown
text: This is the place if you are looking for healthy, beautiful plants with great plant expertise. Especially, for plants that you can't find at HD or Lowes. Not the cheapest around, but the plant quality and knowledge is unmatched in Baldwin County.

name: Nancy Poling
text: Was just at Magnolia  Nursery  2 days ago . Great selection and very knowledgeable  staff.

name: Clem Clapp
text: Pleasant fellow clerked my items with a smile and kind words

name: Donald Ellis
text: I've always found they had the best supply of common, and also unusual plants, trees, gravel and mulch.  Just go to the hut and someone usually is there.

name: Matt V
text: Love this place

name: Cowan Paul Watson
text: Many choices of most every plant suitable for area. Compost and soil amendments in bulk

name: Pam Herweyer
text: I have always got very healthy plants from them and they are very helpful when I have questions.

name: Eug Samuel
text: Purchased a Juniper Tree in January.  The tree completely died by June.  They would not do return, and their other Juniper trees are yellow and dying on display.  Juniper trees I purchased from Lowes and planted at the same time are healthy.

name: Bill Kynes
text: Just really a nice bunch of people to do business with.

name: Dale Winters
text: Good selection and very knowledgeable staff.  Gave me some very solid recommendations.

name: Randal DeFoe
text: Good selection of plants and good people with knowledge of plants

name: April Allen
text: Beautiful selection of plants but a few very unwelcoming employees...

name: Rayford Happy Brannon
text:
Nice and
good employies

name: Felicia Campbell
text: I tried to call and ask if they sold a certain plant and as soon as I asked the lady just said No! And hung up. Rude!!!

name: Frank Tipton
text:
What a great place. Hundreds of acres and great selection of plants, rocks, tools and much more.
I purchased 8 ground Rose's and 10 bushes over a month ago ( check photos) and all are doing great.

name: John Galliera
text: Always great service.

name: Ron Perkins
text: We got some fantastic huge plants that immediately changed our landscape! Super nice folks. If you are buying a whole plant package to transform your property, this is the place to go!

name: Carlton LeMond
text: I have known this business and purchased from them for 30 years and they are the greatest in dealing with every business I have recommended going there. Everything I have ever purchased had been outstanding. I have purchased a large number of 20-30 ft trees high that are still beautiful in every home I have landscaped.

name: Alissa Gay
text: Wholesale only.  Extremely friendly and helpful.

name: Jason Mccormick
text: Great folks with some of the best looking plants you will find in the Birmingham area. Definitely my first choice for purchasing plants.

name: Sarah Lawrence
text: I would never buy from them nor refer any person or business to them. I had a landscape designer refer us and it was the worst experience I've ever had. Not only was I sold half dead plants for $300+ but once I realized I purchased the wrong plants on the design and tried to exchange them the following business day, I was told that "once you take it, it's yours." No credit, no exchange, no return. I can understand weeks out but THE FOLLOWING BUSINESS DAY?! Never again. I am a business owner and I would NEVER treat my customers like this! I will be sure to tell everyone I know.

name: Austin
text: Lots of variety

name: Top Heavy
text: Excellent place to shop! Customer service has been great every time I have been there. The owner will go out of his way to make sure that you're happy when you shop with them.

name: Jay Haskew
text: Huge selection of everything plants and planting. From grass to trees and all in-between and underneath. Staff is friendly and informative.

name: Nita
text: Visited 6/5/2021 at 11 am. I would have loved to have stayed longer as the selection looked wonderful, but I asked the woman inside a question and she was just so rude I had to leave.

name: JEFFREY FORTNER
text: Great people  and place to buy plants.

name: Darryl Castleberry
text: Very helpful and courteous.

name: Rhonda Meads
text: What a great selection of shrubs, plants, etc. Diane was very helpful. We don't need to go anywhere else.

name: david middleton
text: Raquel was really awesome, thank you very much

name: Wayne Martin
text: Very friendly always get great service

name: cara vaughan
text: We purchased sod from them and it was higher quality and lower prices than Lowes. Lowes had theirs stacked on pallets. Crawfords spreads theirs out and waters daily so it has a fighting chance

name: Hannah Liu
text: I've shopped quite a bit at Crawford's Nursery in Odenville.  The people are very helpful, they have one of the largest selections in the Birmingham area, and they are priced much better than any other nursery or home improvement store around.

name: Tiffany Tibbs
text: I have been there several times over the past 2 years. They are always helpful and have an incredibly nice staff.

name: John Ghegan
text: Great people.. Great selection of plants..
